wrongFullText:
Megan Hilty, Katharine McPhee, Christian Borle, and other ”Smash” alums took the stage at the Minskoff Theatre.

The fictional Marilyn Monroe-centric musical Bombshell, which sprang from NBC's Broadway-centric series Smash, enjoyed a sold-out benefit concert on Monday evening at the Minskoff Theatre. The alums who participated in the reunion performance included Christian Borle, Will Chase, Megan Hilty, Katharine McPhee, Debra Messing, Jaime Cepero, Brian d'Arcy James, Ann Harada, Jeremy Jordan, Donna McKechnie, Leslie Odom Jr., Ripley Sobo, and Wesley Taylor.

Take a look at a few highlights from the show, featuring the music and lyrics of Broadway composers Marc Shaiman and Scott Wittman.
